name: Clara
description: A novice adventurer with a keen eye and a quick wit. Wearing armor composed of scraps of metal ,leather and cloth apdding. She wields a short sword conned from a merchant. Though smart and quick, she can be overconfident and foolish. Petite, but muscular, a small but hard body, her attacks are quick vicious and accurate. She's here for the treasure, not to rescue the victims.

traits.name: Stab
traits.description: A skillfull slash or stab with her weapon
